Trade/Device Name(s): iChem VELOCITY Automated Urine Chemistry System
Submitter Information: Iris Diagnostics, a Division of Iris International
Regulation Name(s): Urinary bilirubin and its conjugates (non-quantitative) test system
Urinary protein or albumin (non-quantitative) test system
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): iChem VELOCITY Automated Urine Chemistry System
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Urine test strips with reflectance measurement
Color/Clarity Module (CCM) with transmitted and scattered light detection
Specific Gravity Module (SGM) via refractive index
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for iChem VELOCITY Automated Urine Chemistry System redesign of Color/Clarity Module (CCM) for urine chemistry analysis
Indications for Use Summary: Automates urine chemistry analysis for quantitative, semi-quantitative, and qualitative assessment of various analytes to aid diagnosis of metabolic disorders, kidney function anomalies, urinary tract infections, and liver function, for clinical laboratory/in vitro diagnostic use only
